src:
Trčil v drevo in obvisel nad prepadom
03 Nov 2019, 20:03 by Spletno uredništvo

Na cesti Starod - Račice na Bistriškem je okrog 16. ure osebno vozilo trčilo v drevo in obviselo nad prepadom.



Foto: PGD Ilirska Bistrica

RAČICE > Posredovali so gasilci PGD Podgrad in Ilirska Bistrica, ki so stabilizirali vozilo pred zdrsom in odklopili akumulator. Iz avta so rešili tri osebe ter jim nudili prvo pomoč do prihoda reševalne ekipe NMP Ilirska Bistrica. Dve osebi so oskrbeli na kraju, eno pa prepeljali v izolsko bolnišnico.



Foto: PGD Ilirska Bistrica



Foto: PGD Ilirska Bistrica
text:
He ran into a tree and hovered over the precipice
03 Nov 2019, 20:03 by Web Editing

On the road Starod - Račice in Bistriška, around 4 pm, a personal vehicle collided with a tree and hung over the precipice.



Photo: PGD Ilirska Bistrica

RAČICE> Firefighters PGD Podgrad and Ilirska Bistrica intervened to stabilize the vehicle before it slid and disconnect the battery. Three people were rescued from the car and provided first aid until the arrival of the NMP Ilirska Bistrica rescue team. Two people were treated at the scene and one was transported to the hospital in Izola.



Photo: PGD Ilirska Bistrica



Photo: PGD Ilirska Bistrica
